text: 12.30 In addition to the requirements in Part 1, developments are expected to maximise the provision of affordable housing, having regard to availability of public subsidy, implications of long term or phased development (including provision for re-appraising scheme viability at different stages of development) as well as financial viability which should, in particular, take account of prevailing local and regional viability guidance. 12.31 The requirements of Part 1 apply to all types of housing falling into use Class C3, including Build-to-Rent accommodation.
